channel.title: FX Macro + Technical RSS Feed
channel.description: Hourly FX macro + technical updates covering USD, EUR, GBP, JPY with bond market flows, central bank outlooks, and intraday trade setups.

item.title: FX Market Snapshot — Aug 26, 2025 16:53 UTC
item.description:
EUR/USD — ECB tone steady, Bund yields capped. Key levels: 1.1400 support, 1.1480 resistance.
GBP/USD — BoE cautious, UK gilt yields weighed. Levels: 1.3520 pivot, 1.3600 resistance.
USD/JPY — BoJ stance unchanged, JGB yields steady. Range: 143.50–144.80.
USD — Fed outlook remains restrictive; US Treasury yields stable. Dollar index capped under 102.50.
